name: European Mystery: Flowers of Death Collector's Edition
description: Toxic flowers have been claiming victims and withering plant life in the Netherlands. Can you cultivate the answers to this mystery?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 18554 MB available space
